scripts.test-d: TEST_COMMAND="npm run test" docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yaml up --build --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.test-d-list: TEST_COMMAND="npm run test list-movies.test.ts" docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yaml up --build --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run build:docs && npm run copy:docs
scripts.start:full: npm run migration:up && npm run seed && node dist/index.js
scripts.serve:full: npm run migration:up && npm run seed && npm run serve
scripts.image-push: npm run build-iamge && docker image push giver0/verbup-be
scripts.migration:gen: npm run build && PG_HOST=localhost npx typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:generate -d dist/config/app-data-source.js
scripts.migration:up: npm run build && npx typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:run -d dist/config/app-data-source.js
scripts.migration:down: npm run build && npx typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:revert -d dist/config/app-data-source.js
scripts.docs: npm run lint:docs && npm run build:docs
